name: Goth Mommy Vtuber Game Demo
description:
This truly is a bite sized demo for a Goth Mommy Vtuber game lol barely a minute of game play - but it is fully voice acted! By yours truly, obviously! It may be just 10 short lines but uh oh it is something! 

Tips are appreciated, but not required, you can get this for free and it is very short and a little messy demo, testing an idea. Do let me know what you think? Would it be worth to make a longer game?

Take it as my little Valentine's Day 2022 gift for you sweet batlings, but of course, if you want to support and encourage my creative endeavors you can always throw bits at my twitch.tv/gothmommyvtuber streams or tip through  fansly page (NSFW)
